company_context: Synaptiq Skip to content 972-415-6120 info@synaptiq.com Monday - Friday 8 am - 5 pm Linkedin Synaptiq HOME ABOUT US OUR SERVICES Business Consulting Technology Solutions Professional Staffing RECENT WORK INSIGHTS CONTACT US Search: HOME ABOUT US OUR SERVICES Business Consulting Technology Solutions Professional Staffing RECENT WORK INSIGHTS CONTACT US DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION JOURNEY and business strategies to new innovative business models based on emerging technologies We are helping clients shift from older technologies DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION JOURNEY We streamline processes through Digital Transformation enabling companies to modernize every aspect of their business DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION JOURNEY We are providing an end-to-end strategic approach to modernizing every aspect of your business SCHEDULE CONSULTATION Who We Are Derived from the root word Synapse, Synaptiq was formed to be a vehicle to accomplish vital functions on the journey to Digital Transformation. We connect people with their passions and our services with engaged customers. At Synaptiq, our sole focus is delivering value by combining a best practice approach with experienced consultants to provide high-value, cost-effective solutions to our clients. Learn More Synaptiq Engagement Models With a strong combination of business, technical, and user experience capabilities, Synaptiq delivers value with digital and industry solutions via flexible engagement models. Project Based We build an understanding of the specific business need or issue, work with you to specify a discrete project with measurable results, and deploy an experienced team to execute the initiative. Professional Staffing We learn about your business objectives, challenges, issues, and identify gaps between your current and future state. We leverage a contingent workforce staffing strategy to address your needs with the right people, skills, and capabilities. We help you fill skill gaps to achieve business goals. Managed Service We proactively manage and assume responsibility for providing a customizable defined set of services on behalf of our clients while scaling the service to meet demand. Go to Top

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, is this [CTO Name]? My name is Alex from Synaptiq, and I'm calling today about a potential solution called DeepData AI. I understand you're focused on digital transformation and modernizing your business processes.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alex, thanks for the call. Yes, this is [CTO Name]. We're always looking at improvements, but frankly, we've got a lot on our plate with current initiatives. What exactly is this DeepData AI?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I appreciate you taking the call despite your busy schedule. DeepData AI is a cutting-edge data processing solution designed to significantly streamline your data analysis and unlock deeper insights, which can accelerate your digital transformation journey. We've seen clients achieve X% faster reporting cycles and Y% reduction in data processing costs.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Hmm, X% and Y% are interesting metrics, but honestly, we already have a robust data infrastructure in place. We've invested heavily in our current platforms over the last few years, and integration can be a real headache and a costly endeavor. What kind of integration are we talking about with DeepData AI?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a fair concern. DeepData AI is built with open APIs and has demonstrated seamless integration with most major enterprise data warehouses and cloud platforms. We also offer dedicated integration support to ensure a smooth transition. Our goal is to complement your existing infrastructure, not replace it entirely.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Seamless integration and dedicated support sound good in theory, but the reality often involves significant developer hours and unforeseen compatibility issues. We've been burned by vendors promising easy integration before. Besides, we've already evaluated a few AI-driven data solutions recently, and while they showed promise, the ROI wasn't immediately clear to our stakeholders.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your caution, especially after past experiences. Perhaps we could schedule a brief, 15-minute demo for you and a couple of key members of your team? We can show you a specific use case relevant to Synaptiq's work, like accelerating your business consulting data analysis or optimizing your technology solutions. We're confident you'll see the distinct value proposition and potential ROI more clearly.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alex, I appreciate the offer, but as I mentioned, we're heads-down on existing projects. And frankly, these kinds of solutions require input from my entire data engineering team, not just myself. Itâ€™s not something I can just sign off on without their extensive review and buy-in. I need to defer any further conversations on new data processing technologies to them for now. Thank you for your time.

analysis.raw:
Score: 3
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have focused on understanding the CTO's current priorities and pain points before pitching the solution, rather than assuming their interest based on digital transformation. Sentiment: Neutral
